title: Quick Tab slot system v1.6.3
details:
## Quick Tab Global Slot Assignment (v1.6.3)

### Added slot property to QuickTab domain entity:
- Located in `src/domain/QuickTab.js`
- `slot` property is a positive integer (1, 2, 3...)
- "Quick Tab 1" always refers to slot=1 across all tabs

### StateManager slot assignment:
- `assignGlobalSlot()` method scans all existing slots and returns lowest available
- `getBySlot(slot)` for slot-based lookup
- `assignGlobalSlotFromTabs(tabs)` static method for pre-state assignment
- Slots auto-assigned in `add()` and `addSilent()` if not provided

### Storage format includes slot:
- Serialized in `QuickTab.serialize()`
- Restored from storage via `QuickTab.fromStorage()`
- SyncCoordinator preserves slots during cross-tab sync

### Clear Storage Fix (v1.6.3):
- `handleCloseAll()` and `handleClearStorage()` now clear in-memory state
- Emit `state:cleared` event for proper UI updates
- PanelContentManager listens for `state:cleared` to re-render
